name: data_folder
definition: Data Folder

name: output_folder
definition: CC Output Folder in case keep_all=Y, to store the individual windows. The daily CCF will always be stored in the STACKS/001_DAYS folder.

name: data_structure
definition: Either a predefined acronym [SDS]/BUD/IDDS, or /-separated path (e.g. NET/STA/YEAR/NET.STA.YEAR.DAY.MSEED).

name: archive_format
definition: Force format of archive files to read? Leave empty for slightly slower auto-detection by Obspy, or specify any format supported by obspy.core.stream.read().

name: network
definition: Network to analyse

name: channels
definition: Channels need to match the value (ex: [*], *Z, BH*, HHZ,...)

name: startdate
definition: Start Date to process: [1970-01-01]='since beginning of the archive'

name: enddate
definition: End Date to process: [2100-01-01]='No end'

name: analysis_duration
definition: Duration of the Analysis in seconds (this shouldn't be changed for now)

name: cc_sampling_rate
definition: Sampling Rate for the CrossCorrelation (in Hz)

name: cc_normalisation
definition: Normalisation method for individual `corr_duration`) CCFs, default is not normalized (NO), but can be normalized based on the power of the two traces (POW), or by the maximum (MAX) or absolute maximum (ABSMAX) of the CCF

name: resampling_method
definition: Resampling method

name: preprocess_lowpass
definition: Preprocessing Low-pass value (in Hz)

name: preprocess_highpass
definition: Preprocessing High-pass value (in Hz)

name: preprocess_max_gap
definition: Preprocessing maximum gap length that will be filled by interpolation (in seconds)

name: preprocess_taper_length
definition: Duration of the taper applied at the beginning and end of trace during the preprocessing, to allow highpass filtering (in seconds)

name: remove_response
definition: Remove instrument response

name: response_format
definition: Remove instrument file format

name: response_path
definition: Instrument correction file(s) location (path relative to db.ini), defaults to './inventory', i.e. a subfolder in the current project folder. All files in that folder will be parsed.

name: response_prefilt
definition: Remove instrument correction pre-filter (in Hz, see ObsPy Doc for what it means.)

name: maxlag
definition: Maximum lag (in seconds)

name: corr_duration
definition: Data windows to correlate (in seconds)

name: overlap
definition: Amount of overlap between data windows [0:1[

name: windsorizing
definition: Windsorizing at N time RMS , 0 disables windsorizing, -1 enables 1-bit normalization, -2 enables running absolute mean normalisation

name: RAMN_window
definition:
Integer number of samples on either side of the sample to consider. Total window size is 2N+1. [10]",int,,,
RAMN_EQfilt,-1,Bandpass filter to select for earthquakes for weighting. Format: 'min_freqency

name: whitening
definition: Whiten Traces before cross-correlation: [A]ll (except for autocorr), [N]one, or only if [C]omponents are different

name: whitening_type
definition: Type of spectral whitening function to use: [B]rutal (amplitude to 1.0), divide spectrum by its [PSD] or by band-passing the white spectrum with a hanning-window [HANN]. WARNING: only works for compute_cc, not compute_cc_rot, where it will always be B

name: clip_after_whiten
definition: Do the clipping (winsorizing) after whitening?

name: stack_method
definition: Stack Method: Linear Mean or Phase Weighted Stack

name: pws_timegate
definition: If ``stack_method`` ='pws', width of the smoothing (in seconds)

name: pws_power
definition: If ``stack_method`` ="pws", Power of the Weighting

name: crondays
definition: Number of days to monitor with scan_archive, typically used in cron (should be a float representing a number of days, or a string designating weeks, days, and/or hours using the format 'Xw Xd Xh')

name: components_to_compute
definition: List (comma separated) of components to compute between two different stations

name: cc_type
definition: Cross-Correlation type

name: components_to_compute_single_station
definition: List (comma separated) of components within a single station. ZZ would be the autocorrelation of Z component, while ZE or ZN are the cross-components. Defaults to [], no single-station computations are done.

name: cc_type_single_station_AC
definition: Auto-Correlation type

name: cc_type_single_station_SC
definition: Cross-Correlation type for Cross-Components

name: keep_all
definition: Keep all cross-corr (length: ``corr_duration``)

name: keep_days
definition: Keep all daily cross-corr

name: ref_begin
definition: Beginning or REF stacks. Can be absolute (2012-01-01) or relative (-100) days

name: ref_end
definition: End or REF stacks. Same as ``ref_begin``

name: mov_stack
definition: Number of days to stack for the Moving-window stacks ([5]= [day-4:day]), can be a comma-separated list 1,2,5,10

name: export_format
definition: Export stacks in which format(s) ?

name: sac_format
definition: Format for SAC stacks ?

name: dtt_lag
definition: How is the lag window defined

name: dtt_v
definition: If ``dtt_lag`` =dynamic: what velocity to use to avoid ballistic wave (in km/s)

name: dtt_minlag
definition: If ``dtt_lag`` =static: min lag time (in seconds)

name: dtt_width
definition: Width of the time lag window (in seconds)

name: dtt_sides
definition: Which sides to use

name: dtt_mincoh
definition: Minimum coherence on dt measurement, MWCS points with values lower than that will not be used in the WLS, [0:1]

name: dtt_maxerr
definition: Maximum error on dt measurement, MWCS points with values larger than that will not be used in the WLS [0:1]

name: dtt_maxdt
definition: Maximum dt values, MWCS points with values larger than that will not be used in the WLS (in seconds)

name: plugins
definition: Comma separated list of plugin names. Plugins names should be importable Python modules.

name: hpc
definition: Is MSNoise going to run on an HPC?

name: stretching_max
definition: Maximum stretching coefficient, e.g. 0.5 = 50%, 0.01 = 1%

name: stretching_nsteps
definition: Number of stretching steps between 1- ``stretching_max`` and 1+ ``stretching_max``

name: qc_components
definition: Components to process for QC, defaults to [Z], but can be any comma separated list (e.g. 'Z,E,N')

name: qc_ppsd_length
definition: Length of data segments passed to psd in seconds. In the paper by McNamara et al (2004) a value of 3600 (1 hour) was chosen. Longer segments increase the upper limit of analyzed periods but decrease the number of analyzed segments.

name: qc_ppsd_overlap
definition: Overlap of segments passed to psd. Overlap may take values between 0 and 1 and is given as fraction of the length of one segment, e.g. `qc_ppsd_length=3600` and `qc_ppsd_overlap=0.5` result in an overlap of 1800s of the segments.

name: qc_ppsd_period_smoothing_width_octaves
definition: Determines over what period/frequency range the psd is smoothed around every central period/frequency. Given in fractions of octaves (default of ``1`` means the psd is averaged over a full octave at each central frequency).

name: qc_ppsd_period_step_octaves
definition: Step length on frequency axis in fraction of octaves (default of ``0.125`` means one smoothed psd value on the frequency axis is measured every 1/8 of an octave).

name: qc_ppsd_period_limits
definition: Set custom lower and upper end of period range (e.g. ``(0.01, 100)`` seconds). The specified lower end of period range will be set as the central period of the first bin (geometric mean of left/right edges of smoothing interval). At the upper end of the specified period range, no more additional bins will be added after the bin whose center frequency exceeds the given upper end for the first time.

name: qc_ppsd_db_bins
definition: Specify the lower and upper boundary and the width of the db bins. The bin width might get adjusted to fit a number of equally spaced bins in between the given boundaries.

name: qc_rms_frequency_ranges
definition: Specify the frequency bounds (in Hz) to compute the RMS from PSDs

name: qc_rms_type
definition: What units do you want for the exported RMS
